member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesOleDB.IESRIDataSourceCreate
member.summary: Provides access to members that create OLE DB Data Source objects from a workspace.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesOleDB.IESRIDataSourceCreate.CreateDataSource(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IWorkspace)
member.summary: Creates an OLEDB-FDO Data Source object and connects to existing Workspace.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesOleDB.IFDOToADOConnection
member.summary: Provides access to members that create or connect to an ADO connection from a workspace.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesOleDB.IFDOToADOConnection.Connect(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IWorkspace,System.Object)
member.summary: Connects a Workspace object to an ADO connection object.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesOleDB.IFDOToADOConnection.CreateADOConnection(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IWorkspace)
member.summary: Creates an ADO connection from a Workspace.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesOleDB.IOleDBFDOHelper
member.summary: Provides access to members that attach a workspace to an OLE DB Data Source object.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesOleDB.IOleDBFDOHelper.AttachWorkspace(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IWorkspace)
member.summary: Attaches an existing Workspace to a Data Source object.
